item.title: How do u change name of emote on tab
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

case 185:               //clicking most buttons
				actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
                                if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Zombie"))
                                println_debug("Case 185: "+actionButtonId);
				switch(actionButtonId) {

Under that add this :

Case 163:
teleportToX = ####;
teleportToY = ####;
break;

Add that, then to customize it you can add a
sendMessage(“time to train!”); underneath the teleportToY

You need to just search for case 185 because I have my name in that one so It want find it lol.

Read full topic
